title: Talkbox Medley (Close to You / Never Can Say Goodbye)
lyrics:
[Intro]
David Frost, David Frost, David Frost…
We love you
[Verse 1]
Why do birds suddenly appear
Every time that you are near to me, baby?
Just like me, they long to be
Close to you
[Verse 2]
On the day that you were born
The angels got together
And decided to make a dream come true
So they sprinkled moondust in your hair
And golden starlight in your eyes
So true, ooh, ooh
And that is why
[Refrain]
Never can say goodbye
No, no, no, no, oh
Never can say goodbye
[Verse 3]
Even though the pain and heartache
Seems to follow me wherever I go
(Do-do-doo-doo-doo-do)
(Do-doo-doo-do-dow-wua)
It says, "Turn around you fool…"
"You know, you love her more and more"
Tell me why is it so
I don't wanna let you go

[Refrain]
I never can say goodbye, girl
Ooh, ooh, baby
I never can say goodbye
No-no-no, no-no-no
No-no-no…
[Outro]
I never can say goodbye…
